name: BOM List
query:
SELECT
`tabBOM`.name as "BOM:Link/BOM:180",
`tabItem`.process_no as "Process No:Data:80",
`tabBOM`.item_name as "Item name:Data:210",
`tabBOM Item`.item_name as "Input Item:Data:180",
`tabBOM`.raw_material_cost as "RM cost:Data:90",
`tabBOM Operation`.operating_cost as "Operating cost:Data:80",
`tabBOM`.total_cost as "Total cost:Data:100"

FROM
`tabBOM`,
`tabBOM Item`,
`tabBOM Operation`,
`tabItem`

WHERE
`tabBOM`.name=`tabBOM Item`.parent &&
`tabItem`.item_name=`tabBOM`.item_name

GROUP BY `tabBOM`.name
ORDER BY `tabItem`.process_no, `tabBOM`.name
